item.description:
Join us for a Cardio Sculpt Class! Sunday at 9AM

Located at
Bridget's Dance Studio
89 Pearl St #5A
Braintree MA, 02184
***Pull into Frazier Parkway and the third garage door on the left.
http://www.bridgetsda...

Cost: $10
Minimum: no minimum # of RSVP's... I take Alex's class anyway!
Maximum 15

This class uses hand weights, stability/medicine balls and resistance bands. Alternating aerobic intervals such as step, jump rope, kickbox, and athletic drills with strengthening intervals!!

Be prepared to work up a sweat. Bring some water and maybe even a towel!
item.how_to_find_us: we will meet in the studio

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Cardio Sculpt Class with Alex
